transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Yes sir, aari hai aawaz aapka aawaz aari hai meri, hello?
Customer: Aa gaya hai, toh abhi mere mein kuch message nahi aate, kuch mere mein system order nahi milta.
Executive: Koi message nahi aaya? Kaunsi company se baat kar rahe hai sir? Ek baar company name confirm karenge apna?
Customer: Naklang Handicraft se bol raha hu, koi koi phone bhi phone bhi nahi aate. Isi koi party ka kuch.
Executive: Call nahi aa rahe hai? Phone pe handicraft kya bola aapne sir?
Customer: Naklang Handicraft, aap kaun bol rahe ho? Mera manager.
Executive: Sir mai, sir mai haa IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi. Aapki na aawaz nahi aari hai mujhe. Kaunsi company se baat kar rahe hai aap? Ek baar confirm karenge apna name?
Customer: Naklang Handicraft.
Executive: Explain kare ek baar spell out karenge please? Spelling?
Customer: Naklang Handicraft.
Customer: Naklang Handicraft mai bol raha hu.
Executive: Okay sir, spelling?
Customer: Oh Naklang.
Executive: Sir spelling spelling kya hai? Spelling bataiye.
Customer: Naklang Handicraft.
Customer: Naklang.
Customer: Spelling English toh mere ko aati nahi hai isliye mai bol raha hu.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe ek baar apna number bata sakte hai first mein? Registered number bata sakte hai?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Registered number, registered number jo IndiaMART pe registered hai na number, woh wala number bata sakte hai ek baar?
Customer: Aur 99.
Customer: 99.
Customer: 99 9 82.
Customer: 99 99.
Executive: Sir ek baar English mein bataiye, samajh nahi aa raha mujhe.
Customer: Oh yaar number lagao uska. Oh English toh mere mein bhi nahi aate yeh.
Executive: Aap toh one two matlab 79 bol rahe hai kya?
Customer: 99.
Executive: 99.
Customer: 99 54.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: 99 ke baad?
Customer: Bas yeh 8 8 karo 8 8.
Executive: Accha 98.
Customer: Are kar lo yaar.
Customer: 98 98 ke aage sir?
Customer: 66.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir sir suno apni company name batayenge aap mujhe?
Customer: Handicraft se bol raha hai.
Customer: Sir Naklang se.
Executive: Kya hai sir?
Customer: Naklang karo sir Naklang, nau teen baar karo nau nau.
Executive: Naklang Handicraft hai kya sir?
Customer: Naklang Handicraft.
Executive: Haan Naklang Handicraft hi toh hai sir aap hi ne toh call kiya hai abhi. Kishan Patel ji baat kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kaun baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Mai Kishan Patel bol raha hu.
Executive: Kishan Patel bol rahe hai? Ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan yeh yeh number yeh number hai kya registered yeh chalu hai number yeh.
Executive: Haan yeh number chalu hai sir aapne jis number se call kiya yeh registered number hai aapka. Yeh 99 wala.
Customer: Yeh number chalu hai isi.
Executive: Hello? Isi number se call kiya hai aapne sir?
Customer: Chalu number se.
Executive: Haan isi chalu number se call kiya hai aapne sir. Isi number se toh call kiya 99 wale number se sir.
Customer: Company is is number yeh registered nahi hai?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Yeh registered yeh number hai chalu wala.
Executive: Haan yahi registered number hai sir chalu wala registered number hai aapka.
Customer: Haan haan. Registered number yahi hai sir. Haan ji haan ji sir yahi number hai aapka registered bataiye aapka issue bataiye.
Customer: Kuch kuch order nahi milta kuch nahi woh paisa kitna lagwaya hai jyada lagwaya hai yeh kiraya leke paisa lagwaya hai kuch order toh milta nahi.
Executive: Accha aapko buyleads nahi mil rahi hai yeh keh rahe hai aap na? Inquiry nahi mil rahi hai.
Customer: Kabhi nahi mili haan. Woh do piece paanch piece aisa milta hai aisa thoda tumhara chalta sakte.
Executive: Accha accha do piece paanch piece ke milte hai toh ek baar ek second mai check karti hu. Wait.
Executive: Wait sir mai ek baar check karti hu. Aapka minimum order quantity kya rehta hai waise?
Customer: Minimum 200 piece nahi 100 200 piece. Mera 220 ya 100 yeh toh bola tha.
Executive: 100 aur 200 piece rehta hai na?
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir mai check kar leti hu. Koi baat nahi check kar leti hu. 200 500 aapne order.
Customer: Bulk mein aati hai order aisa bolta tha mera manager toh.
Executive: Dekhiye isme isme deal karte hai aap golden paper dry fruit packaging box?
Customer: Haan haan packaging dry fruit toh. Haan?
Executive: 100 piece mein kar lete hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan toh agar aap dekhiye bulk ka woh filter lagayenge na ek bari. Bulk filter laga ke.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Abhi aap apne uss par hai kya? System par hai?
Customer: System mere abhi aap baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Accha aap mere ko jo buyleads dikh rahi hai 100 pieces ki hai ek yeh bajot chauki chauki mein deal karte hai aap?
Customer: Haan sab karte hai.
Executive: Haan toh is par mujhe 100 pieces ke liye dikh raha hai aap keh rahe hai 100 se 500 pieces ke liye toh mujhe yaha pe 100 pieces ke liye dikh rahi hai toh agar aapko nahi dikhe dikha kare toh aap ek baar filter use kar liya kijiye bulk wala jo filter de rakha hai na top side par.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur ek buylead mujhe dikh rahi hai wood golden meenakari bajot uski bhi bik rahi hai woh bhi 100 pieces ke liye hai yeh maine bulk ka filter laga ke use kara hai agar aapko nahi dikh rahi hai yeh aur ek yeh yeh hai meenakari designer dry dry fruit box toh mai ek kaam karti hu mai aapko yeh wali sari jo leads mujhe show ho rahi hai yeh mai aapko send kar deti hu aap ek baar check kar lijiye aur in buyleads ko matlab ek baar dekh lijiye yeh dry fruit box wagera hi hote hai na aapke generally?
Customer: Haan haan mere WhatsApp mein dal do na.
Executive: Aapka basically yahi tha na sir concern ki aapko jo buyleads aari thi aari hai matlab woh kam quantity kam matlab pieces ki aari hai yahi tha ya aur kuch hai?
Customer: Haan yeh raha hai toh pieces ka phone bhi nahi aata kuch nahi hai. Isi ke sath deal nahi hota hai.
Executive: Deal nahi hota hai. Calls toh mai. Woh aisa bolta hai toh. Woh aisa bolta hai mere se bhul galti se le le le diya aisa bolta hai message aata hai.
Executive: Accha accha accha. Thik hai yeh toh aap jab call karte hai tab par abhi mai dekh rahi thi jaise last aapne buylead yeh August se bahut kam buylead consume ki hai August September October mein bahut kam buylead consume ki hai November mein abhi tak aapne ek bhi buylead consume nahi ki hai November mein toh August se aapke page par koi activity hi nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Samajh rahe hai sir? Haan toh yeh agar dekhiye agar aap char hi buylead consume karenge toh usme kitna hi aapko conversion mil jayega hai ki nahi? Agar agar aap consume karenge matlab agar aap karte hai 10 15 piece buylead jaise 17 toh aapko hum weekly de rahe hai toh aapko 50 60 buylead consume karenge na month mein aapne agar mai August mein batau sir toh char buylead August mein consume ki thi September mein char October mein che aur November mein ek bhi nahi. Yeh aapka buylead ka ratio hai aur agar aap calls ki baat kar rahe hai toh calls aapko dekhiye October mein nau call aaya tha hai na? Jisme se paanch aapka miss ho gaya.
Customer: Company mein phone kar call call toh mere phone mein aate nahi hai isi uthaate hai phone. Isi isi woh bol aate hai mere dono bhai milke. Convert convert nahi ho raha yahi keh rahe hai na? Pehle toh dekhiye sir pehle mai aapko yeh suggest karungi.
Customer: Convert nahi hota khali.
Executive: Yeh nau ke nau calls mein aisa hi kya response tha?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Jo yeh call aaya October mein aapko accha November ka bataiye November mein na aapko teen call aaya toh kya response tha isse matlab kahan par baat end hua aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi woh phone bhi uthaya nahi call bhi nahi aaya isliye toh bolta hu aap company wala bolte ho isi hamare se call aata hai mere call aata hai toh mere ko malum padega na.
Executive: Isse baat bhi hui hai sir aapki. Accha thik hai koi baat nahi aapki na baat ho rakhi hai isliye shayad aapko pata nahi lagta hoga ki IndiaMART se call aa raha hai ya kahan se. Kyunki jo average aapka calling mai dekhu toh woh hai ispe thik hai. Toh ek kaam karenge mai kal aapse ek baar morning mein connect kar lungi video meeting pe mai aapko explain kar dungi ki mai kyun keh rahi hu ki aapko calls call aaya tha kyunki lead manager par aapko sab kuch dikhta hai ki kahan par call aaya kahan par messages aaye jo mai direct messages keh rahi hu woh aaye toh aapko iska pata chal jayega. Dusra number se koi mera wapas sakta hai?
Executive: Dusra number se kaise sir?
Customer: Mere koi dusra number koi mera use nahi karta na koi isi koi.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi aisa nahi hota hai aap number toh ek hi hota hai na sir 294 wala number aapka hi hai na aur 719 wala do number aapne koi mere.
Customer: Nahi sir aisa nahi hota hai do number add kar rakhe hai na aapne apne. Jyadatar jo baat nahi nahi nahi aisa nahi hai nahi hai.
Customer: Aise phone pe aisa mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hota hai dekhiye yeh wala jo do jo jyadatar baat hui hai na aapki calling pe woh is wale number pe hui hai jiske last mein 294 hai.
Executive: Jyadatar jo baat hui hai woh is wale number pe hui hai toh yeh wala number bhi aapka hi hai ki aapke matlab employee ka hai?
Customer: Last mein 294 hai sir. Last mein aap mein 294 hai.
Customer: 294.
Executive: Sir yeh toh mera bhaiya ka hai na.
Executive: Kiska hai yeh aapka hi hai?
Customer: Woh bhi yeh 20 hai aur 24 hai yahi.
Customer: 294 haan.
Executive: Haan toh jyadatar jo baat hui hai woh is number pe hui hai. Kyunki aisa hota hai ki buyer ka agar call aa raha hai aur aap call jaise nahi utha pa rahe aapke bhai ne call pick kar liya toh aapke phone se auto disconnect ho jata hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan toh aisa hota hai ek baar mai aapko kal connect karungi mai ek baar dekhti hu ki kya problem hai aur aisa nahi hota hai ki aapka number se koi aur call pick kar raha hai aisa kuch.
Customer: Mere receive koi kar sakta hai dekh sakta hai mera koi order.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hai. Matlab kya kehna chah rahe hai aap competition wale kehna chah rahe hai ki aapke product mein aur kaun kaun deal karta hai yeh puchna chah rahe hai aap?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Toh dekhiye sir competitors toh hote hi hai aapke same product mein deal karte hai lekin unka alag form name hota hai alag alag hai sab. Jaise aap bhi maan lijiye aap bhi shirt shirts wagera ka business karte hai mai bhi usi ka karti hu toh woh nakal karna nahi hua na sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan toh aisa hai mai isiliye bol rahi hu mai ek baar aapko connect kar lungi mai ek baar aapko sari cheeze explain kar dungi kaisa hai kya hai aur isme aapko tension lene wali koi baat nahi hai aap bas jo aapki buyleads wala jo aapne mujhe bataya ki aapko quantity bulk ki nahi mil rahi hai usme aap filter use kariye woh kariye dusra aapko aapka catalog score thoda kam hai toh ek baar hum catalog score pe kaam kar lenge toh woh thik ho jayega mai aapko kal ek baar video call pe connect kar lungi isi number pe karu jo 794 wala hai kaunse number pe karu 719 wale pe?
Customer: Yeh number wala mat karna.
Executive: Jiske last mein 719 hai?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Thik hai mai aapko is number pe connect kar leti hu kal thik hai. Koi bhi issue hoga toh aap connect kar lenge yeh catalog score wagera baki koi bhi problem hoti hai na sir aap mujhe isi number pe call kariyega thik hai?
Customer: Business karo business nahi hota toh kya karega yeh kiraya bhi nahi nikalta yaar.
Executive: Agar aapko koi issue aata hai wahi mai bolti hu sir agar aapko koi issue aata hai aapko aisa lagta hai ki business convert nahi ho raha hai toh aap mujhe isi number pe convert connect kar sakte hai. Aapka account mai dekh rahi thi madam toh mai aisa bolta hu kuch madad karo isme. Bilkul wahi dekhne ke liye aisa karo kuch. Bilkul bilkul wahi wahi wahi dekhne ke liye sir connect kari thi mai. Thik hai? Ek baar kal connect kar lenge. Business badhega toh mai kaam aage badhega na abhi tak kiraya nahi nikalta. Bilkul bilkul. Toh kal 23 se connect mein rehna thik hai mai dekh lungi aapke thik hai sir aap ek waise bhi aap kafi lambe time se connected hai IndiaMART se ek do saal ho gaya hai aapko toh waise bhi business aayega hi aayega baki jo bhi best possible hoga ki hum kya kar sakte hai aapke catalog mein toh woh mai personally aapko batati hu kal. Business grow karne ke liye bete sir aapke catalog ko sahi karne ke liye thik hai. Thik hai. Thik hai ji kar diyo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough buyleads.

- Buyleads received are for small quantities.

- Not receiving calls.

- Business is not growing.



Resolution:

- Asked to use bulk filter for quantity.

- Executive will connect on video call tomorrow.

- Will discuss catalog score improvement.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on video call tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, filter, quantity
